actions.text: Amendment SA 902 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 106.
Amendment SA 902 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S1258-1259; text: CR S1258-1259) To provide funding for payments for losses of crops due to disasters.
